languages.text: {n}Ваша душа трепещет при взгляде на могучее оружие в ваших руках — оружие, достойное величайшего избранника богов, вершителя судеб, тирана миллионов... в шепоте, льющемся в ваши уши, звучит обещание силы, власти, триумфа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваша душа трепещет при взгляде на могучее оружие в ваших руках — оружие, достойного величайшего избранника богов, вершителя судеб, тирана миллионов... в шепоте, льющемся в ваши уши, звучит обещание силы, власти, триумфа...{/n}

languages.text: {n}One look at the weapon in your hands makes your very soul tremble — it is a weapon fit for the greatest chosen of the gods, the judge of fates, the tyrant of millions... In the whispers flooding your ears, you hear promises of strength, power, and triumph.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваша душа трепещет при взгляде на могучее оружие в ваших руках — оружие, достойное величайшего избранника богов, вершителя судеб, тирана миллионов... в шепоте, льющемся в ваши уши, звучит обещание силы, власти, триумфа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your soul shivers in the look at the weapon in your hands, the suitable weapon for the greatest favourite of the gods, the judge of fates, the tyrant of millions... In the whisper pouring into your ears you hear a promise of strength, power, and triumph.{/n}

{n}Your soul shivers in the look at the weapon in your hands, the suitable weapon for the greatest favourite of the gods, the judge of fates, the tyrant of millions... In the whisper pouring into your ears you hear a promise of strength, power, and triumph.{/n}

{n}One look at the weapon in your hands makes your very soul tremble — it is a weapon fit for the greatest champion of the gods, the judge of fates, the tyrant of millions... In the whispers flooding your ears you hear promises of strength, power, and triumph.{/n}

{n}One look at the weapon in your hands makes your very soul tremble — it is a weapon fit for the greatest champion of the gods, the judge of fates, the tyrant of millions... In the whispers flooding your ears you hear promises of strength, power, and triumph.{/n}

{n}One look at the weapon in your hands makes your very soul tremble — it is a weapon fit for the greatest chosen of the gods, the judge of fates, the tyrant of millions... In the whispers flooding your ears, you hear promises of strength, power, and triumph.{/n}

languages.text: {n}光是看一眼你手中的武器，你就感觉灵魂都在颤抖。这把武器适合最伟大的神选者、命运的裁决者、统治亿万臣民的暴君……它在你耳边低语着，你听到了它许诺会赐予你力量、权力与胜利。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One look at the weapon in your hands makes your very soul tremble — it is a weapon fit for the greatest chosen of the gods, the judge of fates, the tyrant of millions... In the whispers flooding your ears, you hear promises of strength, power, and triumph.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}光是看一眼你手中的武器，你就感觉灵魂都在颤抖。这把武器适合最伟大的神选者、命运的裁决者、统治亿万臣民的暴君……它在你耳边低语着，你听到了它许诺会赐予你力量、权力与胜利。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il vous suffit d'un regard sur l'arme pour vous faire trembler jusqu'aux tréfonds de votre âme : cette épée est destinée au plus grand élu des dieux, au juge des destins, au tyran des masses... Dans les murmures qui inondent votre esprit, vous entendez des promesses de force, de pouvoir et de triomphe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One look at the weapon in your hands makes your very soul tremble — it is a weapon fit for the greatest chosen of the gods, the judge of fates, the tyrant of millions... In the whispers flooding your ears, you hear promises of strength, power, and triumph.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous suffit d'un regard sur l'arme pour vous faire trembler jusqu'aux tréfonds de votre âme : cette épée est destinée au plus grand élu des dieux, au juge des destins, au tyran des masses... Dans les murmures qui inondent votre esprit, vous entendez des promesses de force, de pouvoir et de triomphe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}手の中の武器は一目見ただけで、魂そのものが震えた。こ神々に選ばれし者、運命の審判者、数百万人を支配する暴君にふさわしい武器でだ…耳に押し寄せる囁きの中に、強さを、権力を、勝利を約束する声が聞こえる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One look at the weapon in your hands makes your very soul tremble — it is a weapon fit for the greatest chosen of the gods, the judge of fates, the tyrant of millions... In the whispers flooding your ears, you hear promises of strength, power, and triumph.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}手の中の武器は一目見ただけで、魂そのものが震えた。こ神々に選ばれし者、運命の審判者、数百万人を支配する暴君にふさわしい武器でだ…耳に押し寄せる囁きの中に、強さを、権力を、勝利を約束する声が聞こえる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una sola mirada al arma que tienes en la mano hace temblar tu alma... es un arma digna para {mf|el|la} mayor elegid{mf|o|a} de los dioses, un{mf||a} juez{mf||a} de destinos, un{mf||a} tiran{mf|o|a} que dirige a millones... Los susurros que llenan tus oídos te prometen fuerza, poder y triunfo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One look at the weapon in your hands makes your very soul tremble — it is a weapon fit for the greatest chosen of the gods, the judge of fates, the tyrant of millions... In the whispers flooding your ears, you hear promises of strength, power, and triumph.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una sola mirada al arma que tienes en la mano hace temblar tu alma... es un arma digna para {mf|el|la} mayor elegid{mf|o|a} de los dioses, un{mf||a} juez{mf||a} de destinos, un{mf||a} tiran{mf|o|a} que dirige a millones... Los susurros que llenan tus oídos te prometen fuerza, poder y triunfo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Blick auf die Waffe in deiner Hand lässt deine Seele erzittern ... es ist eine Waffe, die des mächtigsten Auserwählten der Götter würdig ist, des Richters über Schicksale, des Tyrannen über Millionen ... In dem Geflüster, das deine Ohren überflutet, hörst du das Versprechen von Stärke, Kraft und Triumph.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One look at the weapon in your hands makes your very soul tremble — it is a weapon fit for the greatest chosen of the gods, the judge of fates, the tyrant of millions... In the whispers flooding your ears, you hear promises of strength, power, and triumph.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Blick auf die Waffe in deiner Hand lässt deine Seele erzittern ... es ist eine Waffe, die des mächtigsten Auserwählten der Götter würdig ist, des Richters über Schicksale, des Tyrannen über Millionen ... In dem Geflüster, das deine Ohren überflutet, hörst du das Versprechen von Stärke, Kraft und Triumph.{/n}

{n}Ein Blick auf die Waffe in deiner Hand lässt deine Seele erzittern — es ist eine Waffe, die des größten Champions der Götter würdig ist, des Richters über Schicksale, des Tyrannen über Millionen ... In dem Geflüster, das deine Ohren überflutet, hörst du das Versprechen von Stärke, Kraft und Triumph.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Elindeki silaha bakış atmanla ruhun titriyor. Bu; tanrıların en büyük seçilmişine, kaderlerin yargıcına, milyonların tiranına yaraşır bir silah. Kulaklarını işgal eden fısıltılarda güç, kudret ve zafer vaatleri işitiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One look at the weapon in your hands makes your very soul tremble — it is a weapon fit for the greatest chosen of the gods, the judge of fates, the tyrant of millions... In the whispers flooding your ears, you hear promises of strength, power, and triumph.{/n}
